Module com.example.pingpong
Package com.example.pingpong.Controller

Class GameSaver

java.lang.Object
com.example.pingpong.Controller.GameSaver
public class GameSaver extends Object
Singleton class responsible for saving and loading game settings to and from files. This class provides functionality to serialize GameSettings objects into files and deserialize them back into objects.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GameSaver getInstance()
      Provides access to the singleton instance of GameSaver.
      Returns:
      The single instance of the GameSaver.

    • saveGameSettings

      public void saveGameSettings(String filename, GameSettings settings) throws IOException
      Saves the provided GameSettings to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file where the settings will be saved.
      settings - The GameSettings object to be serialized and saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the writing process.

    • loadSettings

      public GameSettings loadSettings(String fullPath) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loads GameSettings from a specified file.
      Parameters:
      fullPath - The full path to the file from which to load the settings.
      Returns:
      The GameSettings object deserialized from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the reading process.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.

    • isFileValid

      public static boolean isFileValid(String fullPath)
      Checks if a file at the specified path is valid for loading. A file is considered valid if it exists and is not empty.
      Parameters:
      fullPath - The full path to the file to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the file exists and is not empty, false otherwise.
